commander_vex.name: Commander Vex
commander_vex.desc: Station commander. Gives quests and advice.

greeting.text: Welcome to Nova Station, recruit. This sector is crawling with hostile invertebrate species. Gear up and stay sharp.

advice.text: Start by mining Stellarite in the Asteroid Mines (northeast). Smelt it at the Bio-Lab (west) to craft equipment. Then head south to the Spore Marshes to train combat.

combat_info.text: Three combat disciplines: Nanotech (close swarm), Tesla (mid electricity), Void (long dark energy). Triangle: Nano beats Tesla, Tesla beats Void, Void beats Nano.

alien_info.text: Chithari beetles for beginners. Voidjelly float and shock. Sporeclaws are fast and poisonous. Gravlurk and Neuroworm are dangerous bosses deep in the wastes.

greeting.text: Welcome, friend! Want to browse my wares?
I specialize in bioforge materials and xenocooking supplies. Interested?

bioforge_info.text: Bioforge crafts organic items from creature parts. The Bio-Lab is just southwest of here in the hub.

cook_info.text: Xenocooking transforms alien ingredients into healing food. Use the cooking stations in the Bio-Lab corner of the hub.

greeting.text: Another greenhorn? I sell mining tools. Asteroid Mines are far east through the corridor!

mining_info.text: Find ore nodes, click them. Higher nodes need higher Astromining. Smelt ore into bars at the Bio-Lab in the hub with Circuitry, then craft gear!

kael_armorer.name: Kael the Armorer
kael_armorer.desc: Master armorer specializing in cobalt and duranium gear.

greeting.text: Looking for the best gear credits can buy? I forge cobalt and duranium-grade equipment. Expensive, but worth every credit.

options.label: How do you make composite gear?

craft_info.text: Cobalt gear requires Cobaltium Bars. Mine Cobaltium Ore in the deep mines, smelt it with level 20 Circuitry, then forge equipment. Or just buy from me if you have the credits.

slayer_grax.name: Slayer Master Grax
slayer_grax.desc: Assigns dangerous hunting tasks with escalating rewards.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

dr_elara_voss.name: Dr. Elara Voss
dr_elara_voss.desc: Neural engineering researcher studying latent neural energy from deep-space organisms.

greeting.text: __PSIONICS_DYNAMIC__

about_psionics.text: Neural Engineering harnesses the bio-electric patterns found in deep-space organisms. The tissue from Neuroworms can be refined into powerful fibers and conduits for crafting advanced gear.

the_archivist.name: The Archivist
the_archivist.desc: An ancient figure who can reset your skills for permanent power.

greeting.text: __PRESTIGE_DYNAMIC__

warden_krios.name: Warden Krios
warden_krios.desc: Military warden stationed at the Corrupted Wastes perimeter. Commands the anti-corruption task force.

greeting.text: __KRIOS_DYNAMIC__

about_corruption.text: The corruption spreads from deep within the wastes. Crystal formations twist living matter into abominations. We must find the source and destroy it before it reaches the station.

about_mira.text: Signal Officer Mira is stationed in The Abyss monitoring deep-space transmissions. She detected anomalous signals that correlate with the corruption. Complete my assignments first, then seek her out.

signal_officer_mira.name: Signal Officer Mira
signal_officer_mira.desc: Communications specialist stationed in The Abyss. Monitors deep-space signal anomalies.

greeting.text: __MIRA_DYNAMIC__

about_signals.text: The signals emanate from something ancient buried in the abyss. Each transmission carries encoded data that defies known physics. I need specialized equipment and protection to trace them to their source.

about_krios.text: Warden Krios is a good man. He fights the corruption on the surface while I track its origin from down here. Together we might actually stand a chance against whatever is causing this.

banker_tessara.name: Tessara the Vault Keeper
banker_tessara.desc: Station vault keeper. Stores your items safely.

greeting.text: Welcome to the Nova Station Vault. Your items are secure with me. How can I help?

options.label: I'd like to access my bank.

capacity_info.text: The vault can hold up to 48 item stacks. Stackable materials will combine automatically. Keep your gear organized and you'll have plenty of room.

mycologist_thren.name: Mycologist Thren
mycologist_thren.desc: A cautious researcher studying the hollows' unique fungal ecosystem.

greeting.text: __QUEST_DYNAMIC__

lore.text: The Mycelium Hollows formed when alien spores took root in the station's waste systems. Now it's a thriving ecosystem — beautiful and deadly.

sporekeeper_ixil.name: Sporekeeper Ixil
sporekeeper_ixil.desc: A cheerful trader who harvests fungal products for sale.

greeting.text: Fresh spore products! Nothing beats my extracts for surviving the hollows.

tendril_hermit.name: Tendril the Hermit
tendril_hermit.desc: An old gatherer who knows every node in the hollows.

greeting.text: Down here, the fungus grows thick and the veins of ore run deep. Need tools for the job?

captain_solara.name: Guard Captain Solara
captain_solara.desc: Station guard posted at the hollows entrance. Assigns bounties on dangerous fungal creatures.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

forager_nim.name: Forager Nim
forager_nim.desc: A brave forager who ventured too deep and set up camp in the Rootweb Depths.

greeting.text: __QUEST_DYNAMIC__

deep_info.text: The Rootweb is where the real ecosystem begins. The fungi here are predatory — they sense vibrations. The Hulks are the apex — slow but devastatingly strong.

banker_sprout.name: Banker Sprout
banker_sprout.desc: A mobile vault operator stationed at the hollows entrance.

greeting.text: Even underground, your valuables deserve proper storage. Shall I open the vault?

sandwalker_ren.name: Sandwalker Ren
sandwalker_ren.desc: A desert nomad who has mapped every dune and ruin in the Solarith Wastes.

greeting.text: __QUEST_DYNAMIC__

lore.text: Solarith was a solar energy research station. When the containment fields failed, the concentrated solar energy fused the sand into glass and scorched everything. The automatons still follow their last orders.

dune_merchant_azara.name: Dune Merchant Azara
dune_merchant_azara.desc: A resourceful trader who hauls goods across the desert.

greeting.text: Desert survival essentials and fine equipment! What'll it be?

dr_solenne.name: Dr. Solenne
dr_solenne.desc: A driven archaeologist excavating the ancient solar research facility buried in Obsidian Canyon.

greeting.text: __QUEST_DYNAMIC__

discovery_info.text: The automatons weren't guards — they were researchers. Synthetic intelligences tasked with perfecting solar energy. When the containment failed, their programming corrupted.

forge_smith_korvus.name: Forge-Smith Korvus
forge_smith_korvus.desc: A massive smith who maintains a portable forge in the desert.

greeting.text: The desert sun fuels my forge. Need materials or repairs?

scout_veyla.name: Scout Veyla
scout_veyla.desc: A veteran desert scout who tracks the most dangerous creatures in the Solarith Wastes.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

oasis_keeper_maren.name: Oasis Keeper Maren
oasis_keeper_maren.desc: Maintains a secure vault at the desert oasis trading post.

greeting.text: The desert may shift, but your vault stays put. Need to stash or grab something?

warden_eidolon.name: Warden Eidolon
warden_eidolon.desc: The last functioning guardian AI of the citadel, manifested as a translucent humanoid figure.

greeting.text: __QUEST_DYNAMIC__

lore.text: This citadel was constructed by the Architects — a civilization that mastered void energy manipulation. They created the singularity to power interdimensional travel. When it destabilized, reality fractured.

phantom_vendor_zyra.name: Phantom Vendor Zyra
phantom_vendor_zyra.desc: A spectral merchant who trades in void-forged equipment.

greeting.text: The void provides for those who dare to trade in its currency. Interested in my wares?

echo_sage_vael.name: Echo-Sage Vael
echo_sage_vael.desc: A being caught between dimensions — partially phased out of reality.

greeting.text: __QUEST_DYNAMIC__

origin_info.text: I was Chief Resonance Engineer when the singularity first destabilized. I attempted emergency phase-shift to survive. Now I exist between dimensions — not alive, not dead.

arms_master_kethis.name: Arms-Master Kethis
arms_master_kethis.desc: A battle-hardened warrior fighting the citadel's corrupted denizens. Assigns the most dangerous hunting contracts.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

void_smith_orin.name: Void-Smith Orin
void_smith_orin.desc: A master craftsman who has learned to work void-infused materials.

greeting.text: Void-forged materials require a steady hand and an understanding of dimensional stress. Need supplies?

dimensional_banker.name: Dimensional Banker
dimensional_banker.desc: A banking terminal that operates across dimensional boundaries.

greeting.text: Dimensional vault link established. Your assets are secure across all phase states.

marsh_warden_tova.name: Marsh Warden Tova
marsh_warden_tova.desc: A seasoned ranger who patrols the marshes and assigns bounties on dangerous creatures.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

marsh_trader_quiln.name: Marsh Trader Quiln
marsh_trader_quiln.desc: A hardy merchant who sells supplies from a rickety marsh platform.

greeting.text: The marshes are no place for the unprepared. Stock up while you can!

marsh_banker_pod.name: Vault Pod Alpha
marsh_banker_pod.desc: A mobile vault terminal deployed in the marshes.

greeting.text: Marsh vault terminal online. Secure storage available.

hive_scout_krix.name: Hive Scout Krix
hive_scout_krix.desc: A fearless insect specialist who ventures deep into the hive tunnels.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

hive_merchant_chiara.name: Chitin Merchant Chiara
hive_merchant_chiara.desc: A trader specializing in chitin-crafted goods and hive products.

greeting.text: The hive creatures drop excellent materials for crafting. Browse my selection!

hive_banker_node.name: Vault Node Beta
hive_banker_node.desc: A hardened vault terminal embedded in the hive wall.

greeting.text: Hive vault node operational. Your items are safe from the swarm.

fungal_ranger_voss.name: Ranger Voss
fungal_ranger_voss.desc: A battle-scarred ranger who tracks the deadliest predators in the fungal wastes.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

fungal_trader_myx.name: Myx the Mycovore
fungal_trader_myx.desc: An eccentric trader who cultivates and sells fungal specimens.

greeting.text: The fungus provides everything you need — food, medicine, weapons! Take a look.

fungal_banker_spore.name: Vault Spore Gamma
fungal_banker_spore.desc: A vault terminal grown from symbiotic fungal-machine hybrid tissue.

greeting.text: Fungal vault link active. Your deposits are protected by bio-encryption.

stalker_hunter_drake.name: Hunter Drake
stalker_hunter_drake.desc: An elite hunter who has survived decades in the stalker reaches.

greeting.text: __SLAYER_DYNAMIC__

stalker_merchant_wraith.name: Shade Merchant Lys
stalker_merchant_wraith.desc: A mysterious merchant who deals in shadow-touched equipment.

greeting.text: In the shadows, only the best-equipped survive. See what I have to offer.

stalker_banker_delta.name: Vault Node Delta
stalker_banker_delta.desc: A reinforced vault terminal hidden in the stalker reaches.

greeting.text: Shadow vault terminal online. Maximum security guaranteed.
